org.jetel.data

Class NullRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.data.DataRecord
      • org.jetel.data.DataRecordImpl
        • org.jetel.data.NullRecord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>, java.lang.Iterable<DataField>

    public class NullRecord
extends DataRecordImpl
    This class represents record will all fields with null value.
    Since:
    April 21, 2008
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • delField

        public void delField(int _fieldNum)
        Description copied from class: DataRecordImpl
        Deletes/removes specified field. The field's internal reference is set to NULL, so it can be garbage collected.
        Warning:We recommend not using this method !
        By calling this method, the number of fields is decreased by one, the internal array containing fields is copied into a new one.
        Be careful when calling this method as the modified record won't follow the original metadata prescription. New metadata object will be created and assigned to this record, but it will share fields' metadata with the original metadata object.
        Overrides:
        delField in class DataRecordImpl
        Parameters:
        _fieldNum - Description of Parameter

             DataRecordSerializer serializer,
             int[] whichFields)
        Description copied from class: DataRecord
        Serializes selected fields from the record into the target CloverBuffer. Used for field exclusion in CloverDataWriter.
        Overrides:

        Parameters:

        serializer - - record serializer
        whichFields - - indexes of selected fields

      • setMetadata

        public void setMetadata(DataRecordMetadata metadata)
        Description copied from class: DataRecordImpl
        Assigns new metadata to this DataRecord. If the new metadata is not equal to the current metadata, the record's content is recreated from scratch. After calling this method, record is uninitialized and init() method should be called prior any attempt to manipulate this record's content.
        Overrides:
        setMetadata in class DataRecordImpl
        Parameters:
        metadata - The new Metadata value
